General.Name: Serrano Resources Ltd
General.Description: Serrano Resources Ltd. engages in the exploration and evaluation of oil and gas properties. The company was formerly known as Mira Resources Corp. and changed its name to Serrano Resources Ltd. in June 2015. Serrano Resources Ltd. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 401 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 5A1

1.Name: Mr. Cyrus H. Driver CPA, CA
1.Title: CFO & Director
